item.title: chat bot vs. the doctors
item.description:
Ethan Mollick on Twitter

‚ÄúExtraordinary new paper from Google on medicine & AI: When Google tuned a AI chatbot to answer common medical questions, doctors judged 92.6% of its answers right ‚Ä¶ compared to 92.9% of answers given by other doctors. And look at the pace of improvement! https://t.co/2Tc2YTUR6E‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/emollick/status/1610261628607512576
